1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: A transfer student with a mysterious ability changes the lives of those around her. Ayami Mutoi (Keiko Kitagawa) is a beautiful and popular teacher who is well liked by both her students and her colleagues. But Ayami has a hard time trusting people and doesn't believe in love. Then one day, a student named Yuiko Koto (Manatsu Kimura), transfers into Ayami's class.
